location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of the Eastern Part of the Arabian Peninsula

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink and pencil on paper, with typescript additions in black and red ink.Dimensions: 328 x 202mm.

mods.abstract: This sketch map is almost identical to the previous map (IOR/R/15/6/186, f 8); it also depicts the eastern part of the Arabian Peninsula, from Ras al Khaimah [Ra's al-Khaymah] in the north-east to Salala [Salalah] in the south-east, and again the place names are in typescript. A red-dotted line marks an interpretation of the interior boundary of the Sultanate of Muscat and Oman. The map accompanies a single page of printed notes on the boundary of Muscat, prepared by the Political Agent and Consul of Muscat.
